Package index

All functions

collections_fetch()
Fetch all collections from an rstac::collections() query
edl_as_s3()
Replace https URLs with S3 URIs
edl_download()
download assets from earthdata over https using bearer tokens
edl_extract_urls()
Extract data URLs from edl_search
edl_netrc()
Set up Earthdata Login (EDL) credentials using a .netrc file
edl_revoke_token()
Revoke an EarthData token
edl_s3_token()
Receive and set temporary AWS Tokens for S3 access
edl_search()
Search for data products using the EarthData API
edl_set_token()
Get or set an earthdata login token
edl_stac_urls()
Helper function for extracting URLs from STAC
edl_unset_netrc()
edl_unset_netrc
edl_unset_s3()
Unset AWS S3 Environment Variables
edl_unset_token()
unset token
gdal_cloud_config()
Recommended GDAL configuration for cloud-based access
gdal_cloud_unconfig()
Restores GDAL default configuration
lpdacc_example_url()
URL for an example of an LP DAAC COG file
with_gdalcubes()
with_gdalcubes
